channel.title: Project Zomboid
channel.description:
Will project zomboid run on these specs?
Cpu: Amd Turion X2 64-tl 64 @ 2.22ghz "Rated @ 3.52ghz preformance
Gpu, nvidia geforce 7150m 2Gb, (128mb-dedicated)
Ram: 4.0gbs
hdd: 120gb
Windows 7 ultimate "64bit"

item.title: Project Zomboid
item.dc:creator: @RUNE-PK RUNE-PK
item.description:
@RUNE-PK wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:2, topic:547499”]http://www.systemrequirementslab.com/CYRI/Requirements/rlsgame/11897

Minimum
CPU: Intel 2.77 GHz Quad Core or equivalent
CPU Speed: Info
RAM: 2 GB
OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7
Video Card: OpenGL 2.1 compatible dedicated graphics card (GeForce 6600/Radeon 9500)
Sound Card: Yes
Free Disk Space: 1.23 GB

So the answer to your question is yes…given you have the available disk space. Although I do not know much about your processor.[/quote]

Mine is a amd turion 64 x2 2.22ghz dual core rated at 3.52 ghz performance

Read full topic

item.title: Project Zomboid
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

http://www.systemrequirementslab.com/CYRI/Requirements/rlsgame/11897

Minimum
CPU: Intel 2.77 GHz Quad Core or equivalent
CPU Speed: Info
RAM: 2 GB
OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7
Video Card: OpenGL 2.1 compatible dedicated graphics card (GeForce 6600/Radeon 9500)
Sound Card: Yes
Free Disk Space: 1.23 GB

So the answer to your question is yes…given you have the available disk space. Although I do not know much about your processor.

Read full topic
